name: 紅雀
message: "The hell?!"

name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "Urgh... Wh-What...?!"

name: 紅雀メンバーＢ
message: "Hey! That sounds bad, man!"
The Beni-Shigures wake up and immediately start panicking.

name: 紅雀メンバーＢ
message: "Is the tower gonna collapse?! Hey, guys, we better get our asses outta here!"

name: 紅雀
message: "Yeah. Aoba, you okay? Grab onto me."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Forget about me."

name: 紅雀
message: "What?!"
Koujaku jerks like he's been struck.
My head hurts like hell. That voice just won't stop. I can barely keep my eyes focused.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Look, forget about me. You guys just..."

name: 紅雀
message: "What the hell're you talking about?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "My power... It's too much. I might... lose control."

name: 紅雀
message: "You mean Scrap?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah... I might... destroy... you guys, too... Please..."

name: 紅雀
message: "Aoba!"
Koujaku grabs me by the collar and looks me in the eye. His glare is so intense that my breath catches in my throat.

name: 紅雀
message: "Look at me, Aoba. This is not the time for this shit."

name: 紅雀
message: "I don't have a clue what's wrong with you. I bet it sucks, but I'm not gonna leave your ass here."

name: 紅雀
message: "I'm here now because of that power, because you destroyed the part of me stuck in the past."

name: 紅雀
message: "So I'm not scared. No fucking way. If you lose control, I'll stop you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Koujaku..."

name: 紅雀
message: "Come on, enough talking. Get up!"
Koujaku throws my arm over his shoulder, then grabs me around the waist and stands up.

name: 紅雀
message: "You're the one who told me not to off myself for some stupid bullshit! I'm taking you outta here, no matter what!"

name: 紅雀
message: "I've still gotta pay you back for saving me."
Koujaku flashes me a confident smile.
I know it's not really the time, but I can't help thinking... he really is my hero.
A warmth fills my chest. It seems to dampen my headache some.
And it feels like the shadow of "him" in my mind... is starting to retreat.

name: 紅雀
message: "Hold on tight. We're gonna get out of here."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Okay."
The room is shaking nonstop. Together, we stagger toward the only exit.
Just as we reach the door, Koujaku looks back.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What's wrong?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Nothing. I just felt like someone was watching us."
For a second, I thought I saw someone.
Wasn't that...

name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "Shit! The floor's crumbling!"

name: 紅雀メンバーＢ
message: "Oh, fuck! Wh-What do we do?!"

name: 紅雀
message: "Don't just stand there!"
Koujaku roars at his men.

name: 紅雀
message: "Get your shit together! You're Beni-Shigure, aren't you?!"

name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "Hell yeah!"

name: 紅雀
message: "Let's blow this joint!"
With the tower coming apart around us, we run.
